reviews.text: A nice enjoyable blonde, Pale yellow color. with a short fizzy head. bready sweet malt taste with a citrus finish. A nice smooth beverage and a giod session beer but nothing special. on cask at the baltic fleet in Liverpool
This is the most interesting of the Chimay beers,  very smooth.pleasing bittersweet aftertaste.the most complex of the chimay beers.
Mild aroma but very crisp on palate....aftertaste is also nice, smooth at right temp..
